title: Summer fun!
content: Hey there! I got lot going today. I started reading Summer Fun by Lammy award winner Jeanne Thornton, and my good friend Tenacity Plys (see above) just announced being selected as the finalist for a Lammy Award too! That's so awesome. Good for xem! That reminds me that after Summer Fun, . If you're in the NYC/NJ area, check out the where you can find all these cool people in their local habitat!

title: Birthdays and Anxieties
content: Happy birthday to my lil niece! She's 6 today! I guess I really am an unc now! I'm cool with it. What I'm not cool with tho is some sicknesses happening in the family. The most I can do is distract myself tho. Keep me in your thoughts, y'all!
